response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return on our investment. We hope you find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your experience. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know promptly. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 14000}
